title: Implement theme switching UI
description:
# Implement Theme Switching UI

## User Story
**As a** Consoul user
**I want** to switch between different visual themes
**So that** I can customize the appearance to match my preferences and terminal setup

## Description

Implement theme switching functionality accessible from the ContextualTopBar (SOUL-55). Users should be able to cycle through available themes and see changes applied immediately without restarting.

## Context

The ContextualTopBar (SOUL-55) will provide a theme selector button/icon. This ticket implements the theme switching logic that cycles through available themes and dynamically reloads CSS.

Consoul currently supports 4 themes: monokai, dracula, nord, gruvbox (defined in src/consoul/tui/css/themes/)

## Technical Notes

**Integration:**
- Add theme button to ContextualTopBar right zone
- Listen for ContextualTopBar.ThemeSwitchRequested message or Ctrl+T binding
- Cycle through available themes
- Reload CSS dynamically using app.load_css()
- Persist theme selection to TuiConfig
- Update ContextualTopBar display to show current theme

**Theme Cycling:**
- monokai → dracula → nord → gruvbox → monokai
- Visual feedback during theme switch
- No TUI restart required

## Acceptance Criteria

**Given** I click the theme button in ContextualTopBar
**When** the button is clicked
**Then** the theme cycles to the next available theme

**Given** I press Ctrl+T
**When** the keyboard shortcut is triggered
**Then** the theme switches to the next one

**Given** the theme is switched
**When** the new theme loads
**Then** all widgets update to use the new color scheme immediately

**Given** I switch themes
**When** the change is applied
**Then** the selected theme persists to config and loads on next launch

**Given** I'm on the last theme (gruvbox)
**When** I switch themes
**Then** it cycles back to the first theme (monokai)

## Dependencies

**Prerequisites:**
- SOUL-55 (ContextualTopBar must exist with theme button)
- Theme CSS files already exist in src/consoul/tui/css/themes/

comments.content: Theme switching has been implemented in the Settings screen (SOUL-47). Users can now select themes from the Appearance tab in Settings (Ctrl+Comma). The Ctrl+T keybinding and theme button from the top bar have been removed since theme selection is now available in Settings. This ticket (SOUL-49) may need to be re-scoped or closed as duplicate functionality.
